original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 812: Firefox and the Future
original_content:
This week, Jonathan Bennett and David Ruggles chat with Sylvestre and Brian about Firefox! Whats up in the browser world, whats coming, and whats the new feature for Firefox on mobile that has Jonathan so excited? Watch to find out!

https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/developer/
https://briangrinstead.com/blog/firefox-webcomponents/
https://browserbench.org/announcements/speedometer3/

Subscribe to catch the show live, and come to Hackaday for the rest of the story!


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.
Places to follow the FLOSS Weekly Podcast:

title: 「Firefox新機能とは？Jonathanが語るモバイル版の魅力」
body: 今週のポッドキャストでは、Firefoxの新機能や最新情報について話し合います。
titles: 「Firefox新機能とは？Jonathanが語るモバイル版の魅力」
